meanings.definition: A person who is under the legal age of consent and therefore considered off-limits for sexual relationships.
meanings.sent1: Parents worry about their children being exposed to jailbaits online.
meanings.sent2: It is illegal to engage in any romantic relationship with jailbaits.
meanings.sent3: The comedy movie had a funny scene where a group of jailbaits tried to sneak into a nightclub.
meanings.sent4: The concept of jailbaits serves as a clear boundary for appropriate relationships.
meanings.sent5: The news story highlighted the dangers of predators targeting jailbaits on social media.

meanings.definition: To entice or seduce someone who is underage.
meanings.sent1: He was arrested for attempting to jailbaits young teenagers online.
